game

Class ZombieAttackAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.AttackAction
        • game.ZombieAttackAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionInterface

    public class ZombieAttackAction
extends AttackAction
    Special class which represents action taken by undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie) to attack alive actors (Human/Player) .
    Author:
    Kee Pei Jiin, Tan Wei Li

        Constructor. Specify the target, weapon, damage and miss chance to be used in the ZombieAttackAction.
